Class Description
AdministratorUI
class that implemets all admin funtions The admin can update, modify and delete items in the menu the reports are generated and .txt files are made or overwriden
BaseProduct  
ClientUI
class used for the reister and login funtions in this class we have the functions of a client to place order and to filter products by any fields he wants.
CompositeProduct  
DeliveryService
This class implements the interface IDeliverySServiceProcessing with all the funtions for the menu items processing with modify, delete and create.

class that implements serializable as all items in the menu are of this type.
Order
all orders of this type will be stored in a hashmap
Serializator
serializing methods are used to store the data when modified and to keep it in a file when the app is colsed
